DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to see whether Statin drugs will act as anti-inflammatories. The investigators will study this potential anti-inflammatory activity in healthy subjects.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Rosuvastatin Response in Healthy Subjects: Potential Mechanisms of Anti-inflammatory Effects
DOC.criteria: Healthy male nonasian subjects Patients with increased liver function tests, elevated serum creatinine, patients on antiinflammatory or immunomodulating drugs
